dmca.title: Health Site Claims Competitor Infringes, Asks Google to Remove Site
dmca.body:
Spine-health.com

[private]
Evanston, Illinois 60201
phone: (xxx) xxx-xxxx fax (xxx) xxx-xxxx
email: [private]@[private]

Medical Advisory Board:
[private - list of MDs]

[private], President	July 28, 2004 
Spine-health.com
[private]
Evanston, IL 60201 USA
[private]@[private]

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043 USA

Re: Copyright Infringement of Spine-health.com

We have identified a website indexed in Google who has violated our copyrights under the DMCA. The infringing website is located at http://spineshealth.enewsgroup.info/. It is a verbatim copy of our copyrighted website www.spine-health.com. The infringed material has been posted to the website with only the name of the site altered from Spine-health to Spineshealth. The company logo has also been copied.

The Search Query: Spineshealth produces a results page displaying a link to the http://spineshealth.enewsgroup.info/ website as the first record of results.

Our contact information is:
Spine-health.com
[private], Evanston, IL 60201
(xxx) xxx-xxxx
[private]@[private]

The Whois record for the owner of the infringing Spineshealth website is: 
Sfly Media
Song Xiaofei
[private], Vanier, ONT K1L 6X9
(xxx) xxx-xxxx
[private]@[private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

We request that Google removes the website from its index and notify any third parties promptly. We would appreciate a response. Thank you and please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or require additional information. Thank you for your assistance.

Signed,
[private]
President, Spine-health.com
